ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:21:03 [Issue ID 4000-632516] urn:comicvine:4000-632516
ComicInfo.Summary:
Vampblade’s adventures with Zombie Tramp and DollFace conclude… wait, no they don’t! This issue leads directly into the new Danger Doll Squad crossover mini-series, also out this month!!
This Danger Doll Squad tie-in features 3 covers (regular, artist, and 90s style), each with a risqué variant as well!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Marcelo Trom | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Trom | 4 | E | 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Timothy Weaver | 5 | F | Risqué 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Timothy Weaver | 6 | Note: Overall issue #21.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/vampblade-season-2-8-the-road-to-danger-doll-squad/4000-632516/
ComicInfo.Title: The Road To Danger Doll Squad Part Three
